data.prayer: Father, encourage the 84,695 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Totonicapán, Guatemala
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Totonicapán, Guatemala.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Totonicapán, Guatemala find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Totonicapán, Guatemala not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, help the 84,695 believers in Totonicapán to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Totonicapán, Guatemala.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Totonicapán. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.
